Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.utils

Class DecksBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc07.utils.DecksBuilder
public abstract class DecksBuilder extends Object
Class used to parse decks' JSON files and build game decks.
